plot: Host Durrell Nelson interviews missionary, Dewald van den Berg as he tells about his journeys down the Congo River to reach tribes who have never seen a white man.
title: The Congo
plot_es: Host Durrell Nelson interviews missionary, Dewald van den Berg as he tells about his journeys down the Congo River to reach tribes who have never seen a white man.
plot_en: Host Durrell Nelson interviews missionary, Dewald van den Berg as he tells about his journeys down the Congo River to reach tribes who have never seen a white man.
